Under the guidance of Optimus Prime, Heatwave and Boulder they aim to one day be super heroes in their own right.

This relic has the power to open the fabric between realms, enabling the powerful Preeminent to enter the NINJAGO world!

And mattress-sized eraser challenge! Each week, two teams of four challenge each other in three different games of supersized kampung-styled games. Winning teams will return to face-off until the last team standing emerges victorious to claim the title of Big, Big Kampung Superchampion!

programme.desc: (R) Based on Louis Cha's classic swordplay novel, this lavish production stars Taiwanese heartthrob Ma Jing Tao as a legendary swordsman and TCS top actress Fann Wong as his love interest. programme.desc: (R) This is the story of ordinary little Moer - Mo Lele who uses his super power to transform into LeLe Knight to fight against the evil witch Kula and protect the manor. (重)摩尔庄园动画片讲述了一个普通的小摩尔——摩乐乐利用自己的超能力变身乐乐侠，对抗邪恶巫师库拉，保护庄园的故事。.

programme.title: 哆啦A梦 New Doraemon - EP 11
programme.desc: This animation series centres on a robotic cat from the future, Doraemon. With its various magical gadgets, Doraemon helps its master solve all kinds of problems. 在这系列卡通动画里，小朋友们将看到哆啦A梦 - 这只来自未来世界的机器猫，如何应用它的法宝，协助其主人大雄解决生活上的各种难题。.

programme.title: 数学荒岛历险记 S4 Math's Island S4 - EP 9
programme.desc: In this new series, Luke and his buddies met a new friend, CODEMAO. They help the residents of the town to solve their problems using the power of programming and mathematics, and the use of intelligence technology changes their lives. 在这新系列,故事讲述罗克和小伙伴们遇到了新的朋友编程猫，大家一起帮助小镇的居民们，使用编程和数学的力量解决问题，让小镇越来越智能化，智能科技改变了人们的生活。.

programme.title: 玩具不插电 Toys Unplugged - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) In this episode, the hosts introduce the nostalgic flag eraser game. They also learn rowing in a pool from a water sports coach. Follow them to the theatre and talk to the puppetry instructor to understand more about traditional puppetry art. The hosts also introduce a simple and fun game, Kerplunk. (重)在本集节目，主持人介绍的怀旧游戏是斗橡皮擦！他们也请来水上活动教练，体验在泳池学习划艇技巧。接着，随他们前往剧坊，拜访偶戏指导老师，了解这项传统艺术。最后，主持人将为大家介绍Kerplunk这个简单又好玩的游戏！.

programme.title: 聚爱圆梦 The Wish - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) Recent years haven't been easy for married couple Kamsiah and Sulaiman, who are doing their best to get by. After losing their son, their health took a turn for the worse. Find out how The Wish team fulfils their special wishes and help them rekindle their love for life. (重)近年来，甘莎和苏莱曼这对年老的夫妻竭尽所能地度过生活难关。自从俩老失去儿子后，他们的健康状况变得更糟。 让我们看“聚爱圆梦"”团队如何实现他们的特殊愿望，并帮助他们重新燃起对生活的热爱。.

programme.title: 一家之宝 Our Family Joy - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) Shane Pow visits an inter-ethnic family who enjoys sports and outdoor activities. He "babysits" the 2 kids experiencing parenting life for his first time. Knowing that Rezal and his wife love camping, Shane arranges a glamping session, while the 2 kids help out with decor and food preparation. (重)谁说有了孩子，就得牺牲玩乐、放弃旅行？异族夫妻Rezal和Wynn每周末都排满户外活动，让2个孩子跟着他们一起冒险玩乐。他们每年也会带两宝出国，体验房车自驾游的公路之旅。本集节目，热爱运动的包勋评探访了这家人，最后决定与2个孩子一起策划特别的露营活动，送给父母一个难忘的回忆。.

programme.title: 星光灿烂 The Glittering Days - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) Xu Wen Hui is a popular singer who was forced to take part in all sorts of singing competition by her adopted father, Jin Long. He treats Wen Hui like a money making machine. She became withdrawn and temperamental. By her own talents, Wen Hui became a very established singer but it did not last long (PG)(重)当红流行歌手徐雯蕙因绯闻遭唱片公司解约，养父蔡金龙强迫她投靠她的生母苏小小。主演：龚慈恩，陈凤玲，童冰玉。.

programme.title: 午餐吃什么 What's For Lunch? - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) The DJs from Love 972 popular morning show - Biyu, Marcus Chin, Mark Lee and Dennis Chew are here! They are taking the hosts to Whampoa Food Centre, a lunch place that they frequent with fond memories. Check out their favourite dishes- fishball noodles, minced meat noodles, lor mee and fried carrot cake, and find out what other tasty dishes will this energetic group recommend on this week's episode of "What's For Lunch?"... (重)Love 972 DJ《早安！玉建煌崇》午餐吃什么？黄埔熟食中心有很多美食让他们念念不忘！他们最喜欢这里的鱼圆面，肉脞面、卤面、炸萝卜糕到底哪些摊位的美食是他们常光顾的呢？节目的下半场，甜蜜情侣包勋评和王智荟与田铭耀午餐吃什么呢？他们来到了火锅专卖店，为什么他们喜欢午餐吃火锅呢？边吃边聊更多情侣和夫妻间的小故事，敬请期待！.

programme.title: 第一主角 The Lead - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) Guang Hui secures the leading role in a youth drama. Meanwhile, An Ya's confidence is shaken because her roles are limited to portrayal of ugly women. programme.title: 第一主角 The Lead - EP 8

He claims Ah Zhen is a naive girl who can't tell the difference between friendship and love. Ah Zhen makes up her mind and plans to confess to Guang Hui but De Ping sabotaged her plan. (PG-性相关语)(重)湘蓉推荐阿真到服装部担任助理，阿真因不用离开电视台而高兴不已。德平警告光辉不能对阿真动歪脑筋，因为她是个傻妹，分不出友情和爱情。光辉怀疑德平爱上阿真，德平否认。阿真决定向光辉告白，却被德平破坏。.

programme.title: 春花望露 Spring Flower - EP 461

programme.title: 《我们的岛屿》 The Islands That Made Us - EP 1
programme.desc: Singaporeans don't often think of themselves as islanders. But the outlying islands are rich in cultural and social history. This feature gives us access to some of Singapore's most unique islands. 新加坡原本由70多个岛屿组成，现在只剩下44个。在这些仅存的岛屿当中，你熟悉的会有几个？圣约翰岛曾经是英国殖民地中，最大的检疫站；乌敏采石场东南一公里外的小镇，是岛上最热闹的地方；2014年，新加坡在南部岛屿，建立了第一个海洋生态园。想对新加坡本岛以外的岛屿有更深一层的认识，就不要错过了《我们的岛屿》。.

programme.title: 灵异怪谈8 Incredible Tales S8 - EP 4

programme.title: 食在有价值 For Food's Sake! - EP 1

programme.title: 我的打拚日记 Workman Diaries - EP 14
programme.desc: (R) In Tokyo, making a living is an uphill battle from young to old. An elderly barber runs a failing business with his wife, by curbing expenses to meagre $12 a day. A freelance street performer decided to pursue an alternative career after graduation but now with marriage on the cards, he worries about his future. And for a young single mother, her divorce left her stigmatised and when she finally found a job, her income is still insufficient to support her child's education cost. (重)曾经日赚1000新元的理发师，为什么沦为‘下流老人'，一日花费仅限12新元？拒绝成为主流白领，41岁街头表演艺人结婚成问题。30岁养老院护理员服务于日本最具潜力的行业，却存不了孩子未来的教育费。看高龄少子化问题如何冲击日本社会。.

Three secondary 2 girls in same school dislike each other and find fault with each other. They are grouped together in a science project and experimented on the bodyXchange formula. Then Poof! The adventure begins.

programme.title: Salam Ramadan Finland - EP 3
programme.desc: Located around170 km west of Helsinki, Tampere is the most loved residential and tourism city in Finland, and has attracted thousands of congress delegates and over one million travelers to visit here every year.Tampere is also internationally known as a city of technology, which has made many world-class breakthroughs. Let's explore this city of innovation and culture, to see how the minority Muslim community here observes the holiest month of the Islamic calendar. Salam Ramadan - FINLAND will showcase the unique beauty of Finnish landscape with its exotic fauna and flora, against which we will experience the colorful ethnic cultures of different races and how the local Muslims has integrated and adapted their Islamic cultures into the rich tapestry of Finnish people.Besides sharing the holy month experience with fellow Muslims around the world, Salam Ramadan - FINLAND series also hope to encourage Muslim tourism for future.

programme.title: Bantal Buruk Saloma - EP 3
programme.desc: BANTAL BURUK SALOMA is a social drama about foster parenting that centres around family, life, love and forming relationships that lasts a lifetime. But it comes with serious challenges, especially when Aidilfitri approaches. Aidilfitri is a happy time for most kids. But for kids in orphanage or foster care, it is not easy. Some miss their parents. While Rafi’s parents visit his house for iftar, Saloma throws a tantrum. Suraya considers placing Saloma with another family. Both Saloma and Adil hate being with their families and decide to spend a day out together without informing their foster parents. Hanis thinks that Zaid and Rahmah want to get rid of her….

programme.title: Salam Ramadan Sabah - EP 3
programme.desc: Nicknamed "Land Below The Wind" Sabah is the state that lies below the typhoon belt of East Asia and is not battered by any typhoons. In the new Borneo series, we will explore how the different community in Sabah observe Ramadan to share their unique experience with the world audience. In the new Borneo series, we will explore how the different community in Sabah observe Ramadan to share their unique experience with the world audience.

programme.title: Dekatkan Jarak Kita - EP 11
programme.desc: Drama about Sofiya who has to live with her aunt after the death of her p parents. Umi Khadijah does not know that her husband Kamil has an evil intentions against Sofiya. He instigated Tasriq to hate Sofiya. Then one day, Umi Khatijah is shocked when she heard Sofiya missing while swimming in the river. Kifli found Sofiya while fishing and brought her home. He decided to adopt her after she cannot remember her family. Unfortunately, Sofiya has a life-threatening illness. Zainab try to console Alysa. They would work together to find ways to save Khadijah from the evil plan of Kamil and Kiah. Khadijah’s still feel hurt with what had happened. Then Tashriq refuses to engage with Riena because he knows that Riena has cooperated with Kiah and Kamil. But Kamil does not want to give up. Tashriq goes to see Umie Zainab and Alysa. Kamal raped Riena that night and warned her from telling her mother. Kamil acts was found out one night after Riena shouts for help. Tashriq comes and punched him. Khadijah and Kiah come along and are saddened with what they saw.

programme.title: J.K.K S3 - EP 13
programme.desc: A story of Kampung Kalut residents that is filled with conflicts. The residents frequently hold meetings about their problems with the Village Headman and Village Council no matter how silly the problem is.

programme.title: Abang Lori Ohsem - EP 3
programme.desc: For Luqman, all his life he has always wanted to be a pilot. Never did he realise that one day, his ambition will take a drastic change when he becomes a lorry driver instead and his nickname "Abang Lori Ohsem".But his life take a turn when he meets a female pilot and falls for her. After being laid off from his cleaner job, Luqman's good friend offer him a job as a lorry driver.While going for his first delivery, he gets involved with an accident with Lufia's car. For endangering her life, Lufia seeks compensation from Luqman.

programme.title: Juang Di Rantauan - EP 3
programme.desc: Mae is a caregiver to an elderly lady. Her pay goes to building a new house and sending her youngest brother to university. Her house has been poorly built. Instead of a proper home, the house is missing a ceiling, and the floors are made of broken concrete. Mae has to go home to sort the matter out with her contractor, and also meet her beloved family. Presented by Dalina Jaapar, Juang Di Rantauan delves into the lives of migrant workers who help to make Singapore tick. What have they given up, whom have they neglected?Mae is a caregiver to an elderly lady. Her pay goes to building a new house and sending her youngest brother to university. programme.title: Mek Gyver - EP 10
programme.desc: Zara is a woman who enjoys doing repairs and will go out of the way to help others whenever they need something repaired - from pipes and computers to cars and farm machinery. Her good friend Aizul runs a repair service and persuades her to work with him. Zara agrees to Aizul's request to earn extra pocket money and to earn money to save a surau. When Izlan opens the same business and asks Zara to join him, she refuses and so the fight begin. Izlan is very grateful to Zarra for helping him when he had a fall while strolling in town.As a token of appreciation, he gives her a bouquet of flower but this has make Aizul feel jealous and uneasy as Izlan is his true enemy. Aizul wants Zarra to stay away from Izlan.

programme.desc: When her school results deteriorate, Hazri becomes worried and decided to get his good friend Azraf to be his sister Raisya's tuition teacher. Reluctantly, he agreed to the offer but Raisya was against it. They had a rough journey together when Raisya's prone to arguing with Azraf which always leads him to lose his patience. programme.desc: With UN work experience, Mary Balikungeri returned to Rwanda after the 1994 genocide to support women who had suffered greatly. She believes women have a new role to play in her country's development.

programme.desc: In the Edo period, childbirth was a community affair, with the mother-to-be attended by a midwife and the women in her life. It was also characterized by unique customs and superstitions.

programme.desc: Full and detailed coverage of rapidly changing developments both in Japan and abroad.

programme.title: Kay Burley @ Breakfast

programme.title: All Out Politics

programme.title: Sky News
programme.desc: All the day's news from Sky News correspondents around the world.

programme.title: Ian King Live
programme.desc: In the this daily business show, Ian King tackles the biggest business and economics stories live from Sky's studios in the heart of the City of London.

programme.title: 28 Winters
programme.desc: Every rider has their own style, but snowboarding is always about freedom, friends and fun. Thomas Delago, Marcus Kleveland, Eero Ettala and the Nitro Snowboard team came to snowboarding by different paths, but they’ve all arrived at the same place: snowboarding is an escape from reality that’s all about freedom, friends and fun.

programme.title: Nicole Moudaber
programme.desc: Meet Nicole Moudaber, the DJ with a double life. Meet Nicole Moudaber, the DJ with a double life. When this Nigeria-born, London-based DJ and producer isn’t travelling the world performing at the world’s greatest clubs and festivals, Nicole likes to spend her spare time driving racing cars.

programme.title: Menno Van Gorp
programme.desc: When B-Boy Menno Van Gorp isn’t travelling the world proving his skills he spends his time creating art. When B-Boy and tracksuit entrepreneur Menno Van Gorp isn’t travelling the world proving his award-winning brand of fluid and innovative breakdancing skills, he spends much of his time creating artwork in his design studio in Rotterdam, the Netherlands.

programme.title: Athens, Greece
programme.desc: Hubertus von Hohenlohe travels to Athens to check out famous sandals, archaeology, water skiing and more. Hubertus von Hohenlohe continues his tour of exciting locations around the globe. This time he travels to Athens, Greece, to check out famous sandals, archaeology, water skiing and more.

programme.title: DJ Ready D
programme.desc: Cape Town musical icon DJ Ready D launches a grassroots organisation to inspire youth through hip-hop. Cape Town musical icon DJ Ready D, a Red Bull Amaphiko Academy mentor, is the founder of the Great Cape Ambassadors Program (G-CAP), a grassroots organisation that uses hip-hop to inspire at-risk youth in his childhood neighbourhood, Mitchells Plain.

programme.title: Lindsey Vonn: The Climb
programme.desc: An inside look at Lindsey Vonn's two-year journey to return from injury to world-class competitive skiing. After two devastating injuries, Lindsey Vonn is faced with the biggest challenge of her life. Can she recover and reclaim her place at the top of the competitive ski world? This film chronicles her journey and personal story of overcoming adversity.

programme.title: The Benefit of Fear
programme.desc: Surfer Andrew Cotton thinks death should be stared in the face from time to time, and psychologists agree. What motivates someone to risk everything for a few seconds of paradise? Big wave surfer Andrew Cotton, along with some leading psychologists, break down the reasons people are drawn to activities where one mistake can mean serious injury or death.

programme.title: Training Body & Mind
programme.desc: To surf the waves Andrew Cotton does, one has to be prepared both mentally and physically. This is what it takes. To surf at the level Andrew Cotton does, he has to go far beyond his natural talent. Mental and physical training gives Andrew the confidence to surf the enormous slabs that he chases. This is his regimen for facing the giants.

programme.title: Control Your Gear
programme.desc: Andrew Cotton talks about the most controllable variable when surfing big waves: the equipment. When chasing huge waves, most of the variables are beyond the surfer's control. Andrew Cotton talks about controlling what he can with his equipment and the safety procedures he uses when he surfs.

programme.title: Michael Wolf
programme.desc: Michael Wolf shares how it feels to hang up the skates to sell shoes after returning to his hometown. Red Bull München's captain, Michael Wolf, intends to retire after the 2019 season to return to his original hometown Füssen, where he's taking over his dad's shoe store. Wolf shares how it feels to hang up the skates to sell shoes.

programme.title: Kevin Reich
programme.desc: See the life, training and problems of young and upcoming hockey goalie Kevin Reich. See the life, training and problems of young and upcoming hockey goalie Kevin Reich and get to know his experienced goalie colleague and mentor Danny aus den Birken.

programme.title: Mang0 and Meagan face off with sharks
programme.desc: Cloud9's Mang0 and Red Bull's wakeboarder Meagan Ethell spend a day wakeboarding and swimming with sharks. Red Bull wakeboarder Meagan Ethell takes Cloud9's Mang0 wakeboarding and swimming with sharks. Both athletes learn the importance of getting out of their heads to be able to be their best in competition.

programme.title: Milktea and Sasha climb to new heights
programme.desc: Rock climber Sasha Digiulian takes Smash Brothers pro Milktea for a climb to learn about problem solving. Lilian ‘Milktea’ Chen, Smash Sisters co-founder, throws herself at the problem when playing Smash – will that same method work for her when rock climbing? Rock climber Sasha DiGiulian takes Milktea for a climb to learn about problem solving.

programme.title: Tempo Storm takes a leap of faith
programme.desc: Red Bull cliff diver David Colturi teaches Hearthstone team members to cliff dive. Like cliff diving, the game Hearthstone is all about calculating risk. Watch as Red Bull cliff diver David Colturi teaches Hearthstone’s Tempo Storm team members Frodan and Reynad to face their nerves and perform a cliff dive.

programme.title: The Fastest Sport on Skates
programme.desc: This is the story of how the unlikely pairing of hockey and boardercross became a global racing phenomenon. From a race down a hill covered in fish market ice to a World Cup series that pulls in a quarter of a million spectators annually, this is how the unlikely mashup of a hockey fight and boardercross became the exciting sport of Ice Cross Downhill.

programme.title: Marcel Hirscher remains the king
programme.desc: After another decorated season, Marcel Hirscher looks ahead to the FIS Alpine Ski World Cup finals in Andorra. Marcel Hirscher looks ahead after another decorated season while Marco Odermatt and Alexis Pinturault do their best to race well at the FIS Alpine Ski World Cup finals in Andorra.

programme.title: Skiing says so long to Aksel Lund Svindal
programme.desc: As skiing pays tribute to retiring Aksel Lund Svindal, the men's DH World Cup goes down to the wire. After one of the greatest alpine skiing careers, we pay tribute to Aksel Lund Svindal as he bows out of his racing career after the world championship in Sweden, while Dominik Paris and Beat Feuz go to war for the World Cup downhill title.

programme.title: Great Things
programme.desc: Jimmy "DeMoN" Ho and Team Liquid start a month-long stay at Red Bull's eSports Studio in California. Jimmy "DeMoN" Ho and Team Liquid start a month-long stay at Red Bull's eSports Studio in Santa Monica, where they begin training for TI4. During counseling, the team discovers they have communication and trust issues that need to be addressed.

programme.title: Mind Up
programme.desc: Boot camp begins with EEG testing and team building as Liquid works on their trust issues. Boot camp begins with EEG testing to identify strengths and growth opportunities. Then it's time for team-building exercises that find Team Liquid paddleboarding as a group and even living together, following the model of successful Korean teams.

programme.title: Robin Hood Army
programme.desc: The Robin Hood Army app collects food from people who have too much and delivers it for free to people in need. In India the social media platform and mobile app Robin Hood Army collects food from people who have too much and delivers it for free to people in need.
